item.title: Project I: Fmoh ISS
item.description: Python Web Developer ehealth4everyone · Internship July 2019 - Dec 2020 · 6 months FCT Abuja, Nigeria Three months before my internship, I took a course on Udemy: Django Dev to Deployment. We explored a real estate web application,github This training gave me the knowledge of building a Real Estate listing application, including an admin dashboard. The first few weeks was spent onboarding and introduction to our code base. We then installed the development version to our individual systems.
